column4: i think the main problem is - i do 'ssh -L 1435:remoteserver2:1435 -l user remoteserver2' from remoteserver1.  i open 1435 on remoteserver1 in firestarter.  from my local machine i should be able to 'telnet remoteserver1 1435' - but i get a 'connection refused'
does not seem to matter whether 1435 is open in firestarter or not i still get 'connection refused'
you are putting a space when you run the command right, like "telnet remoteserver 1435"
